doc:
Sandy Fox https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandy_Fox 0 Sandra Marie Fox (born July 13, 1963) is an American voice actress who has had numerous roles in various animated cartoon, anime and video games. She portrayed the live-action Betty Boop and has provided her voice for Universal Studios and King Features Syndicate for much of their promotional activities and related media and merchandise since 1991. She began voice acting on various animated shows such as The Simpsons, King of the Hill and Futurama. Her first major roles in anime were as Kiyoko in the Animaze dub of Akira and Lady Aska in Magic Knight Rayearth. Other anime characters include Mina and Momiji in Naruto, Sumomo in Chobits, Tachikoma in Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex, and Paiway in Vandread. In video game franchises, she provides the English voice of Mistral and A-20 in the .hack series, Peashy in Hyperdimension Neptunia, and Flonne in Disgaea. In cartoons, she voices Harmony in Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi and Mipsy Mipson in As Told by Ginger. In 2014, she was announced as the voice of Chibiusa/Black Lady/Sailor Chibi Moon in the Viz Media dubs of Sailor Moon and Sailor Moon Crystal. Sandra_Marie_Fox ( born July_13_,_1963 ) is an_American_voice_actress who has_had numerous_roles in various_animated_cartoon_,_anime_and_video_games . She portrayed the_live-action_Betty_Boop and has_provided her_voice for Universal_Studios and King Features Syndicate for much of their_promotional_activities and related_media_and_merchandise since 1991 . She began voice_acting on various_animated_shows such_as The_Simpsons , King of the_Hill_and_Futurama . Her_first_major_roles in anime were as Kiyoko in the_Animaze_dub of Akira and Lady_Aska in Magic_Knight_Rayearth . Other_anime_characters include Mina_and_Momiji in Naruto , Sumomo in Chobits , Tachikoma in Ghost in the_Shell : Stand Alone_Complex , and Paiway in Vandread . In video_game_franchises , she provides the_English_voice of Mistral_and_A-20 in the . hack_series , Peashy in Hyperdimension_Neptunia , and Flonne in Disgaea . In cartoons , she voices Harmony in_Hi_Hi_Puffy_AmiYumi and Mipsy_Mipson in As Told by Ginger . In 2014 , she was_announced as the_voice of Chibiusa/Black_Lady/Sailor_Chibi_Moon in the_Viz_Media dubs of Sailor_Moon and Sailor_Moon_Crystal .
